---
title: "Multiplex for PDX R Users Group"
---

This serves as the web organizing page for a talk on quarto in education specifically focused on the multiplex feature of reveal.js.

A link to the presentation is [https://robertwwalker.github.io/pdxrug-talk/index.html](https://robertwwalker.github.io/pdxrug-talk/index.html)

The code for the presentation can be found on [github](https://github.com/robertwwalker/pdxrug-talk/blob/main/index.qmd). 

The code for the website can be found on [github](https://github.com/robertwwalker/pdxrug/).

I have now use the combination of quarto websites and reveal.js in most of my classes.  Examples include:

- [My Essex Summer School course in Time Series and Panel Data](https://essssda22-3k.netlify.app/)

- [MBA Choice and Forecasting](https://rww.quarto.pub/models-of-choice-and-forecasting/)
